word

Class SubStringWord

  • java.lang.Object
    • word.StringWord
      • word.SubStringWord

  • public class SubStringWord
extends StringWord

    Title: SubStringWord

    Description: class which displays only selected words and it's used for implementing the polymorphism in java.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Diana Sighinolfi
